posts.post_title: FS - 2 PB's: T206 Willis Throwing PSA 5 (sold) & O'Neill PSA 4 (2nd $'s reduced).
posts.post_content:
For Sale - Two PSA graded T206 Polar Bears.  Prices include shipping, please message if interested and thanks for looking.  Note: NC residents add 6.75% to any agreed upon price to cover NC ST.

T206 - Vic Willis Throwing Polar Bear - PSA 5 (only 1 graded higher) Sold.

T206 (2nd price reduction) William O'Neill Polar Bear - PSA 4  $240 venmo or zelle, $249 if you prefer pp gs.
